alert.note: Alert for Adjuntas; Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; San Sebastian; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 4:37PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Adjuntas, Lares, Las Marias, Maricao, San Sebastian and Utuado. * WHEN...Until 530 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 336 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Adjuntas, Lares, Utuado, San Sebastian, Hato Arriba, Maricao, Juncal and Cayuco. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Adjuntas; Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; San Sebastian; Utuado
